## InvertObject type

Type utility that represents the inverted object. Used by the [invert()](./toolkit.invert.md) function to provide type-safe inversion.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InvertObject<T> = {
    [P in keyof T as T[P] & PropertyKey]: P;
};
```

## Example


```ts
type InvertObject<{ a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }> = { 1: "a", 2: "b", 3: "c" }
```
